thread.title: 18 Things You'll Understand If You're Actually Lazy As Fuck
thread.title_full: 18 Things You'll Understand If You're Actually Lazy As Fuck

author: George Rizzuto
title: 18 Things You'll Understand If You're Actually Lazy As Fuck
text:
View this image ›
Walt Disney Pictures ID: 10595529 2. Some days you don’t even leave your bed. View this image ›
Paramount Pictures ID: 10595538 3. But once you’re up, the only thing you want to is crawl back into bed. View this image ›
Nickelodeon ID: 10595532 4. You do everything you can to make sure you don’t have to wake up before 10 A.M. View this image ›
CBS ID: 10595613 5. Sometimes you don’t even put clothes on, because it’s too much work. View this image ›
Lionsgate ID: 10595543 6. Literally every task is so fucking difficult. View this image ›
Relativity Media ID: 10595552 7. And sometimes you pretend to “forget,” just to get out of doing something you didn’t wanna do. View this image ›
New Line Cinema / Via Meme Center ID: 10595555 8. You try not to overwork yourself… View this image ›
Netflix ID: 10595607 9. … because at the end of a busy day, you legitimately feel DEAD inside. View this image ›
NBC ID: 10595611 10. Once you’re down, you refuse to get up for anything… View this image ›
Columbia ID: 10595559 11. …because once your pajamas are on, you are done for the day. View this image ›
Nickelodeon ID: 10595624 12. You find that your sink slowly fills with dirty dishes. View this image ›
Via youtube.com ID: 10595583 13. Which means Febreeze is your best friend, because you don’t clean SHIT. View this image ›
freaky-intangible.tumblr.com ID: 10595589 14. At night, you hold your pee just so you don’t have to get up. View this image ›
CBS / Via bazingapunknowwereeven.tumblr.com ID: 10595594 15. You consider any means necessary when it comes to avoiding walking. View this image ›
NBC / Via Tumblr ID: 10595632 16. This is a common sight in your bathroom… View this image ›
Thinkstock “Someone else will do it.”
ID: 10595633 17. … because helping around the house is just not your thing. View this image ›
Nickelodeon ID: 10595639 18. This is basically your motto: View this image ›
Castle Rock Entertainment ID: 10595648 Lazy people UNITE! …Tomorrow. View this image ›
FOX ID: 10595667 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com!
